name: Intro
_source: narrate;Narrator;Sal defeats the Rizan bandits and promptly advances to Aurelia.
narrate;Narrator;Reminded of her past, Sal is concerned about returning home.
narrate;Narrator;Prince Elias is ready to guide Aurelia to a brighter future.
narrate;Narrator;Though, things are about to take a turn for the worse...
speak;Sal;Seems like the streets are quiet...|The coronation serves as a time of reflection.|Though, I am not glad to be back...
speak;Roag;How BORING! They should be celeberatin' right now, girl!
speak;Sal;Ah, Aurelia...|I am not glad to be back...
speak;Nako;Oh! But, I find this cultural event to be exciting!|I can hardly wait!;low_priority
speak;SoldierBlue;Halt!|You are the envoy of King Sages, correct?
speak;Sal;General Sal of Arcei, here in his stead.
speak;SoldierBlue;Well, follow me to the service, you're almost late.|Also, I'm afraid only one of you may enter, it's tradition to only have one representative at the coronation.
speak;Roag;Well, Sally! We'll wait for ya.
speak;Nako;I wish I could see it with my own eyes...|Oh well, wish the Prince... no, the King, my regards!
speak;SoldierBlue;Well, follow me to the service, you're almost late.
speak;Sal;Oh I see...|Well, I best hurry!
music;TGAA ~ Court is Now in Session
speak;Cres;Why, you must be the representative of King Sages?|I seem to recall you... General Sal?
speak;Sal;Well, yes...|Marquess Cres, right? I remember you visiting from Grahment before.
speak;Cres;That's right. It is so nice to see you, I trust he is well?
speak;Sal;Not such, his illness is worsening.|Hence my being here in his place.
speak;Sal;Thanks you, Marquess Cres.|Er, when does this whole thing start?
speak;Cres;Very soon! Were you any later, it would have been rather... faux pas.
speak;Sal;You can blame his Majesty's directions on that...|Oh! It's beginning!

speak;Jeremiah;Thank you emissaries from our fellow countries.|I am touched to see the solidarity in watching a new dawn for Aurelia.|The Goddess, our divine creator, has blessed the royal lineage for centuries...|Now it is your highness' turn, Prince Elias, to spread her grace!

speak;Elias;Thank you, Archbishop Jeremiah, and everyone else in attendence.|I may be young, but I have inherited my father's passion for this country's prosperity.|I hope that we may all have fruitful relations and mutual growth across the Goddess's lands.
speak;Jeremiah;Now, it is time to crown you, Milord!|Are you ready to solemnly devote your life to the Goddess and her country?
speak;KingSlayer;Heheheha! Take this, Aurelian scum!|For King Sages!
speak;Jeremiah;Wh-what?{c:wait;400} YOUR HIGHNESS!|Oh Goddess... Please save him...
speak;Argento;How could I let this happen...?|Your Highness... forgive me...
speak;EliasDead;Please brighten the future...|Let our citizens bathe in the golden light...|Argento... You must help her...|I see... bright... fleeting...
speak;Argento;It will be done... I will carve a path to our salvation... I promise.
speak;Jeremiah;What manner of demon would cause this...|Did he not say... "King Sages"?|You... Arcein...
speak;Sal;This must be some sort of ruse?! He would never!
speak;Oberon;So, you better explain yourself. Before you pay in blood.
speak;Jevil;What manner of chaos did you wish to cause?
speak;EmelinePrincess;YOU WILL PAY! EVERYONE, AFTER HER!|MY BROTHER...{c:wait;600} WAAAAAAAAAAAAH!

speak;Cres;I agree, but you might want to run, they're not thinking straight!|You'll be allowed sanctuary in Grahment, I'll try and smoothe this heat over for you.|The King Sages I know would never organise this kind of hit job...
speak;Lucian;You Arcein villain! Esteban, after her!
speak;Esteban;As you wish, her head on a platter for your highness.
speak;Skill;You dastards!|My spear will cave in their skulls, your brilliance!
speak;EmelinePrincess;*Sniff*{c:wait;400} Oh thank you Sir Skill!
speak;Cornelius;Your sins will follow you wherever you flee.|The Goddess' will shall see you to damnation.
